name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Around 6pm on September 3, near the Jiefangbei business district in Chongqing.
A man held up a sign to protest Japan's discharge of nuclear waste water. He had an argument with the police and was taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The scene of the memorial event circulated online
Primary and secondary school students played the role of revolutionary martyrs and gave speeches

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"It is forbidden to hurt the feelings of the Chinese nation"
On September 1, the "Public Security Administration Punishment Law (Revised Draft)" was publicly solicited for comments on the website of the National People's Congress.
The newly added Article 34 clearly stipulates that "wearing clothing and symbols that damage the spirit of the Chinese nation and hurt the feelings of the Chinese nation" and "making, disseminating, promoting, and disseminating items or speeches that damage the spirit of the Chinese nation and hurt the feelings of the Chinese nation" will be fined and detained.
The public notice will end on September 30.
This regulation will give the police broader law enforcement powers. In theory, any behavior related to eating Japanese food, wearing Japanese brands, playing Japanese anime characters, liking Japanese culture, expressing different opinions on nuclear waste water, and future behaviors related to Western cultural life can be regarded as hurting the feelings of the Chinese nation and damaging the spirit of the Chinese nation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Give up the desire to make suggestions and respect the advantages of the system

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: The man protested downstairs of the Japanese Consulate General in Chongqing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 4, Chongqing Sunac Baixiang Street

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens discovered that the new elementary school Chinese textbook for the fall of 2023 has deleted and revised the content of the epidemic. It has deleted descriptions such as "pneumonia", "body temperature measurement", and "community volunteers", and it is no longer possible to remember correctly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, a man in Zaozhuang, Shandong jumped onto the tracks and died on the spot

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On September 4, a flight from Chengdu to Osaka played an anti-Japanese movie starring Wu Jing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, a large number of submissions show that a new round of actions to download the national anti-fraud APP has been launched across the country. There are unit requirements, street inspections and school notifications

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[A canteen stall in Guangzhou was punished for pricing too low]
On September 3, a stall called "Ping An Xiang Pao Fan" in the canteen of Guangzhou Huali College was punished by the canteen management Fanghua Catering for selling rice at a price lower than 13 yuan per portion. The penalty notice stated that "the price of rice is lower than 13 yuan, and it has not changed despite repeated warnings."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 4, in Meilan District, Haikou City, Hainan Province, a man hit two people with his car due to a relationship dispute and slashed them. 
The man then ran to a nearby high-rise building and jumped to his death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/i2RCcdHqLU

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of September 4, teachers from Mengjin No. 1 High School and Mengjin No. 2 High School in Luoyang City, Henan Province, collectively sat in protest at the gates of their respective schools. It is reported that the teachers' salaries have been in arrears for several months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In the early morning of September 4, a large number of tanks were transported at the Zhangye Railway Station in Gansu Province.
It happened that Li Keqiang was inspecting and touring in Zhangye, Gansu on that day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, hundreds of thousands of netizens expressed strong support for a video titled "Russian experts suggest using a hydrogen bomb to detonate Japan."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a netizen accidentally discovered that the content of his and his wife's comments on the same video was completely different.
It is speculated that the comments section that users can see on popular Douyin will present content that is more in line with the user's psychology based on big data, thereby achieving the effect of an information cocoon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 4, a netizen went to the measuring instrument in front of the Industrial Exchange Center in Futaba Town, Fukushima, and took a photo of the air radiation value measured that day, which was 0.042uSv/h (equivalent to about 43nGy/h).
The daily nuclear power plant monitoring data released by the Chinese government showed that the air radiation value of domestic nuclear power plants on September 3 was generally above 80nGy/h, and the Daya Bay Nuclear Power Plant was as high as 120nGy/h, which is three times the current level of Fukushima.
In this regard, @jianmang054A Li Jianmang pointed out that because the Daya Bay Nuclear Power Plant has air emissions, while Fukushima is a sea discharge, the radiation value in the air of Daya Bay will be slightly higher.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 4, Chaoyang District, Beijing
Affected by the collapse of the Zhongzhi Group, a large number of people went to the headquarters of Zhongzhi Group to defend their rights. They were beaten by unidentified people in white clothes at the scene, and used white shields to block people around from taking pictures.
The police watching on the side did not stop the violence of the people in white clothes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, the police carried some of the activists away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Rights defenders from the Zhongzhi Group said that they experienced the same thing today as the victims of the Henan Rural Commercial Bank incident on July 10 last year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, the owners of Hangzhou MixC and Hangzhou Yao Landmark Center held a collective sit-in protest

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, parents in Rongjiang New District, Ganzhou, took to the streets to protest against the central canteen's unified distribution of "pre-prepared meals" to schools across the district, demanding the restoration of school canteens. According to local social management bureau staff, because all schools in Rongjiang New District suffered serious losses, they applied for the "central kitchen" to distribute "pre-prepared meals" to all schools. However, due to the poor quality of the food and the delay in meal delivery, parents were dissatisfied and took to the streets to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/aCuQEo519c

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequently, various schools announced that they would no longer distribute lunch through the central kitchen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the victims, this is the largest rights protection action organized by creditors since the Zhongzhi Group went bankrupt more than two months ago. Previously, victims from all over the country had reported the case to local economic investigation agencies and petitioned for more than two months, but the result was that they were passed around, so they were really forced to do so.
However, Zhongzhi Group still has a bad attitude and has no clear statement to creditors. The repayment plan is far away, and 230 billion yuan of more than 80,000 people has evaporated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The security of the Zhongzhi Group has been upgraded again and again, and the Beijing police have cooperated in maintaining stability, targeting everyone.
Many victims have tried every possible way to get to Beijing smoothly, and once they arrive in Beijing, they are accompanied (monitored) by the police. One of the callers has not been heard from for several days.
